text: tatha pratham agrasar muhaajireen[1] aur ansaar aur jin logon ne sukarm ke saath unaka anusaran kiya, allaah unase prasann ho gaya aur ve usase prasann ho gaye tatha usane unake lie aise svarg taiyaar kiye hain, jinamen naharen pravaahit hain. ve unamen sadaavaasee honge, yahee badee saphalata hai
